trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
trait.text: The dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

action.name: Battleaxe
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Handaxe
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
trait.text: The elf has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the elf to sleep.

action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.name: Gnome Cunning
trait.text: The gnome has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

monster.name: Infant Remorhaz
monster.senses: darkvision 30 ft. tremorsense 30 ft., passive Perception 10

trait.name: Heated Body
trait.text: A creature that touches the remorhaz or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 (1d6) fire damage.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

monster.name: Ancient Remorhaz
monster.senses: darkvision 60 ft. tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 10

trait.name: Heated Body
trait.text: A creature that touches the remorhaz or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 21 (4d6) fire damage.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 59 (9d10 + 10) piercing damage plus 21 (4d6) fire damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 20). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the remorhaz can't bite another target.

action.name: Swallow
action.text: The remorhaz makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite's damage and is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the remorhaz, and it takes 28 (8d6) acid damage at the start of each of the remorhaz's turns.

If the remorhaz takes 40 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the remorhaz must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 15 feet of the remorhaz. If the remorhaz dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
trait.text: Aust has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Aust to sleep.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: Aust's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 11). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Special Equipment
trait.text: Aust is wearing signet ring, set of fine clothes with a small silver spinning top that, when spun, endlessly spins until interrupted. Aust is also wearing Moonblade +2 that comes with Gleaming. (This item never gets dirty.)

action.name: Moonblade +2 (Longsword)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage or 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.
